page.title: 16Bright Steels (continued)
page.content:
Bright Steels have built up a world-wide reputation for the precision of its finished products after they have passed through the various shaping and cleaning processes.
The firm takes delivery of hot-rolled steel bars from the mills. These are usually covered in scale and rust.
Bright Steels clean up the mill-produced lengths of round, flat, square or hexagonal shaped dull steel before drawing and elongating them into the shape and form required by the firm's customers.
Bright Steels can provide bars to ordered sizes with tolerances to a few thousandths of an inch and to exact shape and section.
